page.title: 12THE CHURCH AT BARROW VILLAGE
page.content: The Church started about 1200 A.D.and the roof was thatched.Now they have an extra bit on with a wooden ceiling and a blocked-up door and two squint win- dows on each side.There are 3 bells. 220 people can sit in church. The church has got some 300 year old registers which are in Matlock.Last year 6 couples were married in the church.A 100 people come on Sundays,40 come to Sunday school and 18 are in the choir.The service lasts an hour. The vicar has been there 10 years. In the church there is a stone man with his dog at his feet.Outside the old tombs are made of sandstone and slate,the oldest date is 1727.There are 22 box tombs.There are 2 big stained glass windows.
